mapper.update: update reply set state = #{state} where reply_seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select * from (select r.* ,(select count(*) from reply rr where rr.parent_seq = r.reply_seq) rr_count from reply r) r join member m on(r.writer = m.email and r.reply_seq = #{seq})

select r.* , m.* , g.parent_seq as good_parent_seq ,(select count(*) from reply rr where rr.parent_seq = r.reply_seq) rr_count from reply r join member m on(r.writer = m.email and substr(r.reply_seq, 0,2) != 'rr' and r.board_seq = #{board_seq}) left join good g on (r.reply_seq = g.parent_seq) order by write_date desc
